thread.title: Paulo Coelho gifts Shah Rukh Khan an autographed copy of ‘The Alchemist’
thread.title_full: Paulo Coelho gifts Shah Rukh Khan an autographed copy of ‘The Alchemist’

author: Deccan
title: Paulo Coelho gifts Shah Rukh Khan an autographed copy of ‘The Alchemist’
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 23, 2015, 19.43 pm Mumbai: The well-known author Paulo Coelho, who long ago expressed his deep love and respect for SRK after he watched ‘My Name is Khan’, gifted the star a special autographed copy of his book ‘The Alchemist’.
Overwhelmed by this sweet gesture, SRK took to his official Twitter account to share the book’s picture with his fans. He tweeted, “&,when u want something, all the universe conspires in helping u to achieve it.Thx @paulocoelho This is so special.”
&,when u want something, all the universe conspires in helping u to achieve it.Thx @paulocoelho This is so special pic.twitter.com/OosdID5fvL
— Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) October 23, 2015 Paulo Coelho’s autograph on the book reads, “Dear Shah Rukh Khan, a master of acting. With my admiration.”
After Paulo Coelho revealed his admiration for SRK and his film ‘My Name is Khan’ on Twitter, SRK sent a DVD collection of his films to the author.
Tags: entertainment Bollywood Shah Rukh Khan Paulo Coelho The Alchemist Also Read Arjun Kapoor gets frisky with Varun Dhawan at 'Badlapur' wrap party Shruti Haasan walks out of film, gets into legal trouble Salman hit and run case: Blood samples were tampered with says defence lawyer John Abraham to promote FIFA World Cup in India
